detectors.description:
AlienNetworkToken.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/AlienNetworkToken.sol#81-86) can write the state variable array at will
	Dangerous write operations:
	- balances[to] = safeAdd(balances[to],tokens) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/AlienNetworkToken.sol#83)
detectors.markdown:
[AlienNetworkToken.transfer(address,uint256)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/AlienNetworkToken.sol#L81-L86) can write the state variable array at will
	Dangerous write operations:
	- [balances[to] = safeAdd(balances[to],tokens)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/AlienNetworkToken.sol#L83)

detectors.description:
AlienNetworkToken.transferFrom(address,address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/AlienNetworkToken.sol#88-94) can write the state variable array at will
	Dangerous write operations:
	- balances[from] = safeSub(balances[from],tokens) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/AlienNetworkToken.sol#89)
	- balances[to] = safeAdd(balances[to],tokens) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/AlienNetworkToken.sol#91)

detectors.description:
